mapper.select:
SELECT /* Ara3.selectItemInfo */
A.CTR_NO , A.CTR_ID , A.CTR_NM
A.STR_NO , A.STR_ID , A.STR_NM , A.REL_CTR_NO
A.USR_NO , A.USR_ID , A.USR_NM , A.REL_STR_NO
, A1.TEL_NM , A1.TEL_NUM , A2.MBL_NM , A2.MBL_NUM , A3.EML_NM , A3.EML_ADDR , A4.BNK_NM , A4.BNK_ACNT , A4.ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , A5.MRRG_LOC FROM
ARA3_CTR A LEFT JOIN ARA3_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'CTR'
ARA3_STR A LEFT JOIN ARA3_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'STR'
ARA3_USR A LEFT JOIN ARA3_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'USR'
WHERE 1=1
AND A.CTR_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{ctrid})
AND A.STR_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{strid})
AND A.USR_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{usrid})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Ara3.insertCnntAraKey */ ARA3_CNNT VALUES ( SEQ_CNNT.NEXTVAL, #{connid}, #{conntyp}, #{arakey}, 'Y', SYSDATE, null, null )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* Ara3.updateAllCnntByCnntid */ ARA3_CNNT A SET A.CNNT_YN = 'N' , A.DCNT_DTTM = SYSDATE , A.CNNT_MSG = 'FAIL' WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNNT_ID = #{connid} AND A.CNNT_TYP = #{conntyp} AND A.CNNT_YN = 'Y'

UPDATE /* Ara3.updateCnntByCnntid */ ARA3_CNNT A SET A.CNNT_YN = 'N' , A.DCNT_DTTM = SYSDATE , A.CNNT_MSG = 'SUCCESS' WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNNT_ID = #{connid} AND A.CNNT_TYP = #{conntyp} AND A.ARA_KEY = #{arakey} AND A.CNNT_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara3.selectCnntArakeyInfo */ A.CNNT_NO , A.CNNT_ID , A.CNNT_TYP , A.ARA_KEY , A.CNNT_YN , A.CNNT_DTTM FROM ARA3_CNNT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNNT_ID = #{connid} AND A.CNNT_TYP = #{conntyp} AND A.ARA_KEY = #{arakey} AND A.CNNT_YN = 'Y'
SELECT /* Ara3.selectLocInfoList */ A.CODE , A.CD_NM , A.CD_DESC , A.SORT_NO FROM ARA3_CODE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.GRP_CD = 'C015' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SORT_NO
SELECT SEQ_USR.NEXTVAL AS USR_NO FROM DUAL /* Ara3.selectSeqStrNextval */
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Ara3.insertAra3Usr */ ARA3_USR VALUES ( #{USR_NO}, TO_CHAR(#{USR_NO}), #{usrName}, null )
INSERT INTO /* Ara3.insertAra3Mrrg */ ARA3_MRRG VALUES ( #{USR_NO}, 'USR', 'Y', TO_DATE(#{usrMrrgDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{usrMrrgLoc} )
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara3Ctr.selectLoginInfo */ B.ITM_NO , B.ITM_ID , B.ITM_NM , B.ITM_TYP , NVL(B.MBL_NUM, '-') AS MBL_NUM , NVL(B.EML_ADDR, '-') AS EML_ADDR , NVL(B.MRRG_DT, '-') AS MRRG_DT FROM ( SELECT A.USR_NO AS ITM_NO , A.USR_ID AS ITM_ID , A.USR_NM AS ITM_NM , 'USR' AS ITM_TYP , A.REL_STR_NO , A1.TEL_NM , A1.TEL_NUM , A2.MBL_NM , A2.MBL_NUM , A3.EML_NM , A3.EML_ADDR , A4.BNK_NM , A4.BNK_ACNT , A4.ACNT_NM , TO_CHAR(A5.MRRG_DT, 'YYMMDD') AS MRRG_DT , A5.MRRG_LOC FROM ARA3_USR A LEFT JOIN ARA3_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA3_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'USR' WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = TO_CHAR(#{USR_NO}) ) B WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARA3_LOGIN VALUES ( SEQ_LOGIN.NEXTVAL, #{loginSrch}, #{loginList}, #{ITM_NO}, #{ITM_ID}, #{ITM_NM}, #{ITM_TYP}, SYSDATE ) /* Ara3Ctr.insertLoginInfo */
